meanings.definition: In a manner that is beyond criticism or blame.
meanings.sent1: She completed the task irreproachably, without any mistakes.
meanings.sent2: He always behaves irreproachably in front of his parents.
meanings.sent3: The cat walked irreproachably across the room, pretending not to knock over anything.
meanings.sent4: The sun shone irreproachably, casting a golden glow over the landscape.
meanings.sent5: Her singing voice was irreproachably beautiful, captivating everyone in the audience.

meanings.definition: In a way that is faultlessly or impeccably.
meanings.sent1: The chef cooked the steak irreproachably, it was perfectly juicy.
meanings.sent2: The artist painted the portrait irreproachably, capturing every detail flawlessly.
meanings.sent3: The robot danced irreproachably, never missing a beat.
meanings.sent4: The athlete ran irreproachably, breaking the world record effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The clockwork mechanism worked irreproachably, ticking with precision.
